import axios from"axios";export default{// Get all Memes
getMemes:function getMemes(){return axios.get("/api/createdMeme");},//get one meme
getMeme:function getMeme(id){return axios.get("/api/createdMeme/"+id);},//delete meme
deleteMeme:function deleteMeme(id){return axios.delete("/api/createdMeme/"+id);},//create a meme
createMeme:function createMeme(memeData){console.log(memeData);return axios.post("/api/createdMeme",memeData);},//post liked meme
likeMeme:function likeMeme(memeData){return axios.post("/api/likedMeme",memeData);},//unlike a meme
unlikeMeme:function unlikeMeme(memeId){return axios.delete("/api/likedMeme/"+memeId);}};
